document.full_text: china hailed on tuesday the death of osama bin laden in a u.s. raid while defending its regional partner pakistan against accusations it had done too little against terror threats.
document.title: china hails death of bin laden, defends partner pakistan
lines_and_colors: china hailed on tuesday the death of osama bin laden in a u.s. raid while defending its regional partner pakistan against accusations it had done too little against terror threats.
